text: In UI Toolkit, which feature allows you to define how elements should be aligned and spaced within a container?
feedbackCorrect: Flexbox allows you to define how elements should be aligned and spaced within a container. It can help you build complex UI layouts and automatically handles layout adjustments for different screen sizes.
feedbackIncorrect: In UI Toolkit, the Flexbox feature allows you to define how elements should be aligned and spaced within a container. While Grid, Stack, and Box can be used to arrange elements, they do not offer the same level of control and responsiveness that Flexbox does for aligning and spacing elements.
